ValidationRule.description: Disability Coverage should be direct billed.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
$Setup.Master_Validation__c.Account_Active__c && NOT(OR($RecordType.Name = "Health & Benefits", $RecordType.Name = "Scale")) &&
AND( CONTAINS(Coverages__c, "Disability"),
AND(OR( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Received"), ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Accepted"))),
OR( ISPICKVAL(Billing__c, "Agency"), ISPICKVAL(Billing__c, "Premium Finance Agreement")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Disability Coverage should be direct billed.
